title: liquibase various errors migrating from 2.2.3 to 2.3.1
body:
### Describe the bug

I migrate fro 2.2.3Final to 2.3.1FInal and liquibase file fails with several errors when loaddata e.g. 
liquibase.exception.DatabaseException: CLOB resource not found when trying to insert data with liquibase file

    <createTable tableName="crimereportdetails">
      <column name="id" type="bigint" autoIncrement="true">
        <constraints primaryKey="true" nullable="false" primaryKeyName="crimereportdetails_pkey"/>
      </column>
      <column name="description" type="${clobType}"/>
    </createTable>

crimereportdeatils.csv 

id;description
1;a serious crime
2;another serious crime
3;this is a test crime
4;null

_No response_

_No response_
